Package org.drip.function.r1tor1

Class ExponentialTension

java.lang.Object
org.drip.function.definition.R1ToR1
org.drip.function.r1tor1.ExponentialTension
public class ExponentialTension
extends R1ToR1
ExponentialTension provides the evaluation of the Exponential Tension Function and its derivatives for a specified variate.

  • Module = Computational Core Module
  • Library = Numerical Analysis Library
  • Project = Rd To Rd Function Analysis
  • Package = Built-in R1 To R1 Functions
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
